endpoints.description: Retrieve the list of all managed infrastructure resources to monitor and organize.
Add a new resource to the managed infrastructure list for monitoring purposes.
Update the configuration or properties of an existing infrastructure resource.
Remove an existing resource from the managed infrastructure list.
Retrieve performance metrics for the managed infrastructure to analyze and ensure efficiency.
Retrieve the list of recent security events for review and action.
Define a new scaling policy for automatic infrastructure scaling.
Modify an existing scaling policy to adjust its parameters.
Remove an existing scaling policy from the system.
Retrieve the overall health status of the entire managed infrastructure.
